gami_overview.title: gämi Platform
gami_overview.description: gämi is an all-in-one cloud platform for creative entrepreneurs. It offers file storage, tagging, integrated messaging, and powerful search. Designed to eliminate app-switching fatigue and cluttered workflows - the creative nervous system.
variations: gämi = the creative nervous system you've been seeking. File storage, tagging, messaging, search - unified in one platform. No more app-switching fatigue, no more digital chaos.
All-in-one cloud platform designed for creative minds. File storage that works, tagging that makes sense, messaging that flows, search that finds. The end of scattered workflows.
Your digital dojo. One platform handling file storage, smart tagging, integrated messaging, and powerful search. Built to eliminate the chaos of juggling multiple tools.

file_storage.title: File Storage & Management
file_storage.description: Store and access files on all your devices with mobile-optimized upload. Features include multiple file uploads at once, unzip/zip directly in platform, and seamless sync across devices.
variations: File storage that doesn't make you question your life choices. Access files on any device, bulk upload multiple files, mobile-optimized interface. Plus zip/unzip right in the platform.
Your files, everywhere you need them. Mobile-first upload, bulk file handling, seamless device sync. Zip and unzip without leaving the platform.
File storage like having infinite pockets in your ninja outfit. Upload from mobile, handle multiple files at once, sync across devices instantly.

file_management.title: File Organization
file_management.description: Personalize folders and audio with images. Advanced tagging system with BPM detection, key recognition, mood classification, and custom tags. Set thresholds for BPM, key, and mood analysis.

file_sharing.title: File Sharing
file_sharing.description: Built-in file sharing with enhanced external share link controls for secure collaboration. Control who can access your files with advanced permissions and secure link settings.
variations: Share your work securely with enhanced link controls. Set permissions, control access, and collaborate safely with external share links.
File sharing that doesn't compromise security. Enhanced external link controls let you decide who can view, download, or edit your shared files.
Share files with confidence using advanced link permissions. Control access levels and maintain security while collaborating with others.

audio_export.title: Audio Export for Social Media
audio_export.description: Export audio files as shareable videos optimized for social media platforms. Turn your audio content into visual posts for better social engagement.

communication.title: Communication Suite
communication.description: Encrypted messaging, voice notes, and audio/video calls. Features To-Do messages for task management, turning conversations into actionable items.

collaboration.title: Collaboration Features
collaboration.description: Timestamped and stamped notes (even for non-users). Community folders for shared projects enable seamless team collaboration.

flex_play.title: Flex Play
flex_play.description: Flexible media player that continues playback while navigating other sections of the app. Supports full-screen mode for immersive experience.
variations: Flex Play = media player that doesn't interrupt your flow. Keeps playing while you navigate the app, plus full-screen mode when you want total immersion.
Background media player that actually works. Continue playback while jumping between sections. Full-screen available when you need that immersive experience.
Media player with ninja-level flexibility. Playback continues seamlessly as you navigate. Full-screen mode for when you want to dive deep.

media_organization.title: Media & Playback
media_organization.description: Create playlists and galleries for audio, image, and video organization. Comprehensive media library management for all your creative assets.

search.title: Powerful Search
search.description: Advanced search capabilities across all your files, tags, and content. Find what you need instantly without digging through folders.

pricing.message: Pricing is still being finalized by the team. It will be competitive and designed for creative professionals.

launch.message: gämi is currently in pre-launch phase. Stay tuned for updates on the official release date.
